title: Genesee County Community Action Resource Department (GCCARD) - Housing Assistance
address: 601 N. Saginaw St., Suite #1A, Flint, MI 48502
description: GCCARD offers housing assistance programs, including rental assistance, housing counseling, and homeless prevention services, to low-income individuals and families in Genesee County.

title: Genesee County Women's Shelter
description: The Genesee County Women's Shelter provides emergency shelter, transitional housing, and support services to homeless and underserved women and their children in Genesee County.
